Summary: Two bright obects,orange yellow in color,twinkled like a star flew through a path initially,then both of them hovered for few seconds before the lights faded away
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kochi
There were no other sightings in Kochi on or around November 17th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my family were talking in the dining room of our house in a town called alwaye in india.Thats when one of my cousin who was walking outside in the night spotted two flying bright objects.First i thought it was two planes.But in our place it is highly unusual to see two aircrafts flying this close to each other.Secondly i dint spot any strobe lights on the objects which made me curious and i called the rest of the family to witness it.the two objects where flying under a 1000 feet i think and flew towards our direction in a path.then it suddenly stoped and hovered and the lights faded away as if the objects flew to space.We couldnt spot the shape of the objects as the light coming from it was bright and it twinkled.
